creditline: Gift of John and Julie Roth
description: man in camouflage pant sweeping near right edge next to a line of 13 white bombs; in wood frame with black acrylic glazing; artist's proof (odd size), edition size 6
markings: on label, on back of frame: [Whitney Museum of American Art/945 Madison Avenue, New York, N.Y. 10021/Paul Shambroom: Untitled (B83 Nuclear gravity bombs, each with estimated 1 megaton yield, Barksdale Air Force Base, Louisiana), 1995/Color Coupler print, 39\' x 48\'/Courtesy of the artist/1997 Biennial/March 20-June 15, 1997]
medium: Color coupler print (Fujiflex Super FA), cold-mounted on acrylic
title: Untitled [B83 nuclear gravity bombs, each with estimated 1 megaton yield, Barksdale Air Force Base, Louisiana]
